weekly_top_story.headline: International Association of Genocide Scholars declares Israel guilty of genocide in Gaza
weekly_top_story.summary: The International Association of Genocide Scholars (IAGS) has publicly accused Israel of committing genocide in Gaza, intensifying calls for international legal and humanitarian responses amid escalating conflict.

stories.headline: Desperate search for survivors continues after 6.0 magnitude earthquake kills over 800 in Afghanistan
stories.summary: A 6.0 magnitude earthquake in Afghanistan has resulted in over 800 deaths and 2,500 injuries, with urgent humanitarian aid efforts impeded by political and logistical challenges.

stories.headline: Putin, Xi Jinping, and Kim Jong Un hold symbolic summit amid shifting geopolitical alliances
stories.summary: Russian President Putin, Chinese President Xi Jinping, and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un met to project a united front, signaling evolving power dynamics ahead of upcoming global diplomatic negotiations.

stories.headline: Hawaii’s Kilauea volcano erupts again, sending lava into the air
stories.summary: Kilauea volcano in Hawaii has renewed eruption activity, shooting lava into the air and raising concerns about air quality and local safety for nearby communities.
